actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (SELECT video_id,created_time,
											cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date = '{{moment().add(-1, 'day')}}':: date
 	and name is not null
group by video_id,created_time,total_video_views),
CTE_view_date as (
	SELECT video_id,created_time,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date = '{{moment().add(-2, 'day')}}':: date
	and name is not null
group by video_id,created_time,total_video_views)
select sum(CTE_sumtotal.Total_Video_Views-coalesce(CTE_view_date.Total_Video_Views,0)) as count_today 
from CTE_sumtotal full join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
